articles.title: The new Redmi Note 14 costs CZK 4,290. For this price will be just a moment
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching the Redmi Note 14 series, with the base model priced at CZK 4,290. The Redmi Note 14 includes a vibrant display, 108MP camera, fast charging, and AI features. A higher-end model, the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G, is priced at CZK 9,990 and has advanced AI features, a 200MP camera, fast charging, and water resistance; promotional prices and gifts are available until February 9th.

articles.title: CVS Testing App to Unlock Merchandise Cabinets
articles.author: Sean Marshall
articles.summary: CVS is testing a new mobile application. The application empowers customers to unlock display cabinets. This aims to speed up customer service.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy S25 Series Smartphone
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25, featuring advanced AI capabilities. The Galaxy S25 series incorporates multimodal AI agents and a Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform customized for Galaxy, enhancing processing power and camera capabilities. The devices also support interactions in multiple Nigerian languages.

articles.title: If You're Looking For A Trash Can For Your Bathroom, Here Are The Best Ones
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a range of new bathroom trash cans with various features and designs. These include automatic motor sensor cans, pop-up lid bins, step pedal cans, farmhouse-style cans, mini swing-top lid cans, polyresin cans from QL Design, plastic cans, plant-style lid cans, bamboo waste baskets, metal cans, pebble-design wastebaskets, wicker baskets, and round plastic choices. These products are available in various colors and sizes and cater to different bathroom aesthetics.

articles.title: The laundry detergent container shoppers call 'too cute' is $21 (nearly 40% off)
articles.summary: Whole Housewares launched its Laundry Detergent Container, designed for storing laundry pods and powdered detergent. The container features an airtight lid, included scoop, and minimalist design. It is currently on sale at Amazon.

articles.title: CVS Knows You Hate Those Locked Cabinets
articles.summary: CVS is introducing a new feature in its CVS Health app that allows registered loyalty members to unlock previously locked product cabinets themselves using their smartphones. This 'smart locks' feature, currently in a pilot program in New York City, will expand to 10 stores on the West Coast. The aim is to improve customer convenience and reduce wait times caused by locked products.

articles.title: 'Absolute delight' of perfume 'that lasts' now down to £20 on Amazon
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Amazon is offering Vera Wang's Princess 100ml perfume at a discounted price of £18.71. Boots is hosting an 'up to half price' fragrance sale including Michael Kors Sexy Amber Eau de Parfum, reduced from £80 to £39. Debenhams has Britney Spears Midnight marked down from £49 to just £18 for 100ml.

articles.title: IO Connect Rebrands as Nova: Ushering in a New Era of Innovation
articles.author: NOVA
articles.summary: IO Connect Services has rebranded as Nova and launched a new suite of offerings in Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), Generative AI (GenAI), and vertical solutions for commerce platforms and payment systems. Nova aims to provide cutting-edge technology and impactful solutions to its clients.

articles.title: Motorola Razr 50 latest news
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is offering the Motorola Razr 50 at an unbelievable price.

articles.title: Motorola Razr 50 availability in India
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola offers the Razr 50 at an attractive price point, presenting a golden opportunity for Motorola fans to acquire this stylish and innovative phone.

articles.title: I'm a beauty editor and I've tried hundreds of different perfumes in the hunt for my perfect fragrance - but AI found it in seconds
articles.author: BETHAN KING
articles.summary: EveryHuman has launched a new AI-powered service in collaboration with The Fragrance Shop that creates bespoke fragrances based on individual scent preferences and personality, using an online quiz and algorithm to blend personalized scents. Customers receive three 5ml samples and can order a full-size bottle starting at £60 for 30ml, with the option to tweak the scent online by adjusting the percentages of different notes.

articles.title: Kia Sportage L Launched in Pakistan – Here's What You Need to Know
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Lucky Motors is launching the Kia Sportage L (Long Wheelbase) in Pakistan, offering a feature-rich compact SUV with petrol and hybrid variants. It boasts dimensions of 4,660 mm length, 1,865 mm width, and 1,665 mm height, along with advanced safety and technology features like dual 12.3-inch displays and driver-assist systems. The official pricing and booking details will be announced on February 6.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra's Now Brief has glaring issues but holds potential
articles.author: Steve Vegvari
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the new Galaxy S25 series. This series includes a new feature called "Now Brief."

articles.title: People flock to long-awaited Midtown Fort Collins King Soopers Marketplace
articles.author: Logan Newell
articles.summary: King Soopers launched its new Midtown Marketplace store in Fort Collins, Colorado on January 29, 2025. The grand opening included a ribbon-cutting ceremony and featured characters like the Nesquik bunny and Chester Cheetah, and is attended by customers, community leaders, and King Soopers representatives.

articles.title: DOWZE Launches the Ultimate At-Home Teeth Whitening Solution for Active Lifestyles
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: DOWZE has launched a teeth-whitening product. The product is designed for busy individuals aged 18 to 45. The product aims to deliver simplicity, convenience, and impactful results.

articles.title: CVS May Let You Unlock Shelves Yourself, But There's a Catch
articles.author: Chris Malone Méndez
articles.summary: CVS has launched a new CVS Health app featuring the capability to unlock display cabinets in select stores, aiming to improve the customer pharmacy experience. This feature allows customers to access merchandise without requiring employee assistance. The company emphasizes that the app is designed to make it easier for customers to manage their health and care and make informed decisions.

articles.title: DOWZE Launches the Ultimate At-Home Teeth Whitening Solution for Active Lifestyles
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: DOWZE has launched DOWZE, a teeth-whitening product designed for busy individuals aged 18 to 45, delivering simplicity and convenience for a brighter smile. The product requires only 10 minutes a day for noticeable results and is designed to boost self-assurance, aligning with the values of individuals who prioritize health, appearance, and confidence. Customers can find more information on how it can transform one's smile with minimal effort by visiting https://dowze.com.

articles.title: Brightcove Launches AI Content Suite To Maximize Content Creation and Production for Customers
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Brightcove has launched its AI Content Suite, a collection of AI-powered tools designed to enhance video content impact and improve business productivity.  The suite includes features for content creation, metadata optimization, and translation, automating processes like converting long-form content into engaging short-form clips and generating metadata. The Brightcove AI Suite will continue to launch new products based on customer feedback.

articles.title: This slime-like gel cleans your car's nooks and crannies, and it's down to $7
articles.author: Izabella Zaydenberg
articles.summary: Pulidiki Cleaning Gel, priced at $7, is introduced as an effective solution for cleaning car interiors, especially hard-to-reach areas. The gel is designed to adhere to dust and debris without leaving residue and can be reused until it turns black. Over 50,000 Amazon shoppers gave five-star reviews for its ability to clean car interiors.

articles.title: Your laundry will look newer and brighter if you add one surprise kitchen staple to your washine machine drum
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: The Wee Scotty Cleaners, also known as Hazel Mckinnie and Claire Jenkins, have launched their own cleaning product called Pro Glass Cleaner. This product is designed to provide a streak-free finish on glass surfaces.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers say this mattress vacuum 'really opens your eyes to how dirty things can get' — and it's on sale
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: The JIGOO Mattress Vacuum Cleaner, available on Amazon Canada, is designed for deep cleaning mattresses, pillows, and furniture by lifting dirt, dust, and allergens. It features UV light, ultrasonic waves, a HEPA filter, and ergonomic design to keep sleeping areas fresh. Customer reviews praise its suction and cleaning abilities, highlighting the removal of dust and mites.

articles.title: Why DeepSeek's New AI Model Should Prompt Reality Checks For Companies
articles.author: Edward Segal
articles.summary: DeepSeek introduced a new AI model that is cheaper than those offered by OpenAI, Google, and Meta. The AI model cost DeepSeek only $5.6 million in computing power. Competitors are advised to respond strategically and consider innovations beyond merely copying the offering.

articles.title: KRBL unveils new packaging for 'India Gate' basmati rice, targets 60 pc mkt share
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: KRBL Ltd has introduced new packaging for its 'India Gate' basmati rice brand, after 25 years. The new packaging features an updated logo, structured information about basmati rice grain length, usage guidelines for different food preparations, and a QR code.

articles.title: Dyson Launches New Handheld Vacuum — What to Know
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the Car+Boat handheld vacuum for $279.99 on February 4, 2025, available on Dyson's website and Amazon. The Car+Boat boasts a 50-minute runtime and a 110,000 RPM motor, outperforming the Humdinger model. It includes attachments like a motorized brush bar and crevice tool.

articles.title: Windows 11 users with iPhones: if you're jealous of Android's Start menu integration, here's some good news – Apple phones are now getting it
articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new feature in Windows 11 that integrates iPhones into the Start menu via the Phone Link app. This update allows iPhone users to view their phone's battery status, access messages and calls, and send files directly from their PC, similar to existing Android integration. The feature is currently available for Windows Insiders in the Beta and Dev channels.

articles.title: More powerful, less expensive: The Dreame Z30 competes with Dyson on every front
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Dreame has launched the Z30 Cordless vacuum cleaner, boasting a powerful 310AW suction. It features a color screen for information display, an array of accessories, and blue LED lighting for detecting hidden dirt. The vacuum also includes an automatic suction mode that adjusts power based on dirt levels.

articles.title: New CVS app will allow customers to unlock merchandise
articles.author: Jessica Jones-Gorman
articles.summary: CVS has launched a new app which is a successor to the CVS Pharmacy app, that allows customers to manage prescriptions, schedule immunizations and expedite checkout. The app includes a new feature being tested which allows customers to unlock merchandise cabinets, providing easier access to products. Registered loyalty members can use the app's unlocking function while logged in, on the store's Wi-Fi, and with Bluetooth enabled.

articles.title: Preorder the Samsung Galaxy S25 Series today at Walmart and be the first to experience the future
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Series, an AI-powered smartphone with a 200MP camera and customized user experience. The Galaxy S25 Series is available for pre-order on Walmart in multiple colors and is expected to ship by mid-February, offering features like enhanced selfie taking and smart reminders.

articles.title: Beauty writers test out Kylie Jenner's new powder foundation that 'blurs skin in seconds'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Kylie Cosmetics has launched a new product called 'Natural Blur Powder Foundation.' This powder foundation promises a blurred matte finish, medium buildable coverage, and is formulated with ingredients like bamboo powder and aloe barbadensis leaf extract. It is designed to be versatile, serving as a foundation, finishing powder, or touch-up product.

articles.title: Ola to unveil Gen 3 electric scooter this week
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Ola Electric is launching a new electric scooter based on the Gen 3 platform on January 31. The new scooters have higher performance, more features and an improved design over Gen 2 products. Ola Electric anticipates a 20% margin savings with the new platform.

articles.title: HONOR unveils its game-changing AI-powered HONOR X9c smartphone in South Africa
articles.author: HONOR
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR X9c in South Africa, highlighting it as the first mid-range device with flagship-level AI capabilities. The HONOR X9c features a durable design, long-lasting battery, and a 108MP camera and retails starting at R10,999. HONOR also teased the upcoming launch of the HONOR Magic Book X14 laptop in South Africa.

articles.title: bet365 vs Sky Bet: Which bookmaker is right for you?
articles.author: Calum Weill
articles.summary: Bet365 and Sky Bet offer various services to their customers, including welcome offers, existing customer offers like Acca Boost and Acca Freeze, and free-to-enter games. Bet365's casino offering includes own-brand tables and can be accessed via the sportsbook app, while Sky Bet has Sky Vegas and Sky Casino apps with slots, roulette, and blackjack tables.

articles.title: Fossibot S1 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Fossibot launched the S1, a 5G-ready smartphone featuring a MediaTek Dimensity 6100+ processor, 6GB RAM, and 128GB internal storage. The S1 has a 6.745-inch display, a 50MP main camera, and is powered by a 4900 mAh battery with 10W charging. It runs on Android 14 and is available in Green and Gray colors.

articles.title: I've Tried Hundreds of Craft IPAs. This Cheap, Easy-to-Find Beer Is My Go-to in a Pinch
articles.author: Courtney Iseman
articles.summary: Sierra Nevada launched Hazy Little Thing in 2018, marking a shift for the brewery and introducing a new style of IPA. The Hazy Little Thing flagship became a success and is now the top-selling hazy IPA. Its success has led to a portfolio of 'Little Things,' including Big, Hoppy, Tropical, Rad, Dank, Cosmic, and Juicy variations.

articles.title: Starbucks is cutting 30% of its menu
articles.author: Jordan Valinsky
articles.summary: Starbucks plans to reduce its menu by 30% of both beverages and food offerings to simplify choices and improve customer experience. While eliminating some items like olive oil drinks and iced energy drinks, Starbucks has also introduced new products such as the espresso-based cortado and reintroduced pistachio-flavored drinks.

articles.title: CVS Has a Plan to Make Those Locked Cabinets Less Annoying
articles.summary: CVS is introducing a new feature in its CVS Health app that allows registered loyalty members to unlock product cabinets themselves using their smartphones. This feature, which started as a pilot program in New York City, is planned to be rolled out to approximately 10 stores on the West Coast. The new app aims to reduce customer wait times and improve the overall shopping experience.

articles.title: Sweet Street Introduces Scoopables(TM) - a New Era of Gourmet Desserts
articles.summary: Sweet Street has introduced Sweet Street Scoopables™, a new line of ready-to-serve desserts designed for foodservice menus. The product line includes Cheesecake, Apple Compote, and Chia Pudding, and emphasizes healthier choices such as lower sugar, non-GMO ingredients, and plant-based options. Sweet Street Scoopables are available nationwide through major foodservice distributors.

articles.title: Next's new £26 fleece jacket is so cosy it's 'a struggle to take it off'
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: Next is selling a pink heart half zip jacket. Next's team describes the jacket as perfect for colder spring days, keeping wearers stylish. The jacket comes in a range of colors.

articles.title: Alibaba releases updated AI model that 'surpasses DeepSeek
articles.author: Technext
articles.summary: Alibaba has released a new version of its Qwen 2.5 artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Washing machine buying guide: 4 key reasons energy efficient washing machines help you save on utility bills
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Energy-efficient washing machines use advanced technology to reduce power and water consumption, potentially cutting laundry costs by up to 50% annually. Modern models have features like optimized wash cycles, load sensors, and water-saving technologies which reduce utility bills and waste. Buying models with high energy star ratings or the label help save more power and resources.

articles.title: 5 Best Spring Cleaning Products Under $40 at Target Right Now
articles.author: Dawn Allcot
articles.summary: Mr. Clean continues to launch new iterations of its Magic Eraser, including the Ultra Bath cleaner with Dawn and Febreze. Swiffer introduced the Power Mop, a more powerful version of the WetJet. Bissell offers the Featherweight stick vacuum, a lightweight and convertible cleaning solution.

articles.title: Acquia Brings AI Search Experiences to its Digital Experience Platform with New Solution Powered by SearchStax
articles.summary: Acquia partnered with SearchStax to launch Acquia Search powered by SearchStax in February 2025. This new search solution replaces Acquia's existing Solr site search service, offering advanced AI-driven search capabilities. It will be available in three tiered plans and included in Acquia Cloud Platform and Site Factory subscriptions.

articles.title: Mother-Son Duo Takes Rinseroo to Shark Tank - Will They Land a Deal?
articles.summary: Rinseroo, invented by Lisa Lane, is a slip-on hose attachment designed for easy rinsing that simplifies cleaning showers, bathing pets, and managing everyday messes. Since its launch, Rinseroo has achieved millions in sales and positive reviews. Lisa Lane and her son will be pitching Rinseroo on Shark Tank.

articles.title: AXIL Announces Next Generation of Over-the-Ear Hearing Protection and Enhancement Products
articles.summary: AXIL Brands is launching the new MX Series Earmuffs, advanced earmuffs for comfort, functionality, and performance. The MX Series Earmuffs will be available on AXIL's website starting February 15, 2025, and at select global retailers starting March 15, 2025.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Corporation and Van Houtte Coffee Services Announce Entry into an Agreement for Distribution of Cizzle Brands' Products Across Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands has partnered with Van Houtte Coffee Services (VHCS) for the distribution of Cizzle Brands' product lineup across Canada. VHCS will also take over distributorship for Cizzle Brands' existing accounts. Cizzle Brands offers two leading product lines in the sports nutrition category: CWENCH Hydration and Spoken Nutrition.

articles.title: Why get a MacBook when you can get this 2024 Lenovo that has four display options?
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Lenovo is offering a 'like-new' IdeaPad 5i laptop at a discounted price of $579.99. This 2-in-1 device features a 360-degree hinge for laptop, tablet, tent, or stand modes, a 16-inch WUXGA touchscreen display, an Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 1TB of SSD storage. The laptop also includes Rapid Charge Boost and a fingerprint reader.

articles.title: KRBL Unveils New Packaging for 'India Gate' Basmati Rice, Targets 60 Pc Mkt Share
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: KRBL Ltd has unveiled new packaging for its flagship 'India Gate' basmati rice brand after 25 years, featuring an updated logo, QR code, and detailed information about the product. The company aims to achieve a 60% market share in the branded basmati rice segment over the next 3-5 years.

articles.title: If Your Home Needs A Deep Clean, Try These 24 Products
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: The article presents a list of new cleaning products available on Amazon, including Wet & Forget cleaner, a dryer vent cleaning system, pumice cleaning stone, stainless-steel cleaner, Iron Out spray gel, garbage disposal brush, washing machine cleaning tablets, The Pink Stuff, OxiClean powder, long-handle wall cleaner, mattress vacuum, lint roller, cleaning brush kit, microfiber cloths, vacuum hose attachment, CLR, Affresh cleaning tablets, wood polish, Glisten foaming cleaner, adjustable duster brush, stain cleaner, Bar Keepers Friend cleansing and polishing powder, water-based tile pen and FlexiSnake Drain Weasel. These products are designed for various cleaning tasks around the house, from removing mildew to cleaning drains, and are available for purchase on Amazon.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers snap up Fairy and Ariel laundry pods for just 19p
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on laundry products. XXL packs of Fairy Non-Bio Platinum Pods and Ariel All-in-1 Washing Pods are reduced from £36 to £23.32. Ecover Zero Non-Bio Laundry Detergent is also on sale for £4.74, and Bold All-in-1 Pods are available for £24.69.

articles.title: 'GMA3' Deals & Steals for kitchen and home
articles.author: GMA Team
articles.summary: Several companies are offering deals on new or existing products. Broombi features cleaning tools, while Amodex offers stain removers. Linens & Hutch provides bedding, and Cariloha offers bamboo towels and bathrobes. FluffCo offers pillows, and McCrea's features caramels. Cheryl's Cookies provides cookie gift sets. Pretty Thai offers cooking sauces, The Cookie Cups has baking kits, and Biom provides plant-based wipes.

articles.title: Adorable toastie maker 'makes banging toastie' and looks good doing it
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Salter is offering a Handbag Shape Toastie Maker, available at Amazon and Robert Dyas. This 750W appliance features a handbag design with rose gold accents and deep-fill non-stick plates. Alternative sandwich toasters are available from BREVILLE at Currys and at Dunelm.

articles.title: Fossibot F101P Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Fossibot has launched the F101P, a rugged smartphone featuring a 10600 mAh battery with 18W charging, a 5.45-inch IPS LCD screen, and a MediaTek Helio P22 processor. The F101P includes a 24MP main camera and an 8MP front camera and runs on Android 13, is available for purchase at different prices from online shops.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 128GB model tipped to launch soon at a much lower price
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch a Galaxy S GB model soon. This new model will be offered at a significantly reduced price compared to existing options.

articles.title: Former VML CCO Jared Kozel Launches Indie Agency Super Nice
articles.author: Kyle O’Brien
articles.summary: Super Nice, a new independent agency, has officially launched in Atlanta and Los Angeles.  The agency aims to provide creative and strategic services with a focus on empathy and innovation, offering clients direct access to leaders and a tech startup mentality.

articles.title: SJD World rolls out AI chatbot service
articles.author: Jessie Moniz Hardy
articles.summary: SJD World has launched a new AI-powered chatbot service for businesses in Bermuda, designed to provide instant information and personalized support. Partnering with Text, SJD World develops AI chatbots tailored to specific companies, offering benefits such as improved customer interaction. Rugged Rentals is already using the service.

articles.title: Next's new £24 t-shirt dress with pockets is 'such good value' and 'can be dressed up or down'
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: Next has launched a new t-shirt dress, available in sizes 6-26 and tall options. The dress includes pockets and is described as practical and lovable. It is a recent addition, without reviews yet.

articles.title: This colourful Fanta Xbox Series X is easily my favorite competition prize yet
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Xbox and Fanta are collaborating on a new console giveaway. This marketing strategy promotes both the Xbox console and Fanta beverage.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy new Ugg dupes in middle aisle – and they're €120 cheaper
articles.author: Isabela Boechat
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland is launching Ladies' slippers for €9.99 and a hair dryer for €49.99. The Ladies' slippers are Ugg dupes, offering comfort and warmth with a cushioned insole, while the hair dryer is a dupe for the Dyson Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer and features a brushless motor, ionic action, and multiple settings.

articles.title: Alibaba releases new version of AI model, claims it outperforms DeepSeek-V3
articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.summary: Alibaba has released its Qwen 2.5 AI model, which it claims outperforms DeepSeek-V3. DeepSeek launched its AI assistant powered by DeepSeek-V3 model and later released the R1 model. ByteDance also updated its flagship AI model, which it claims outperforms OpenAI's o1 in AIME.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer's new £45 skater dress is great for 'casual days' and gives 'boho vibes'
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new skater dress available in petite, regular, and tall sizes. The dress is new and currently lacks reviews.

articles.title: Samsung and LG unveil new OLED tech, including stretchable and transparent screens, to counter Chinese rivals, which held a 33% market share in 2024, per DSCC (Nami Matsuura/Nikkei Asia)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Samsung and LG are introducing new OLED technologies, such as stretchable and transparent screens. These advancements are aimed at counteracting increasing competition from Chinese companies in the OLED market.

articles.title: 6 pop-up ad targeting techniques to boost results (Part 1)
articles.author: Syed Balkhi
articles.summary: PetLab Co. introduced exit-intent pop-ups offering an additional 5% discount to address high cart abandonment rates among first-time buyers.  This strategy led to a 15% reduction in abandonment rates and an 8% boost in overall revenue for first-time buyers within three months.

articles.title: Sleep specialist Simba has just launched a huge winter sale on mattresses, pillows, and duvets
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Simba Sleep has announced a winter sale with discounts up to 20% on core products. The sale includes mattresses like the Hybrid Essential (starting at £424.15), Hybrid Ultra (£1,481.22), Source (£959.20), and Apex (£1,599.20). Bedding such as the Hybrid Pillow is also discounted to £92.65, and the Hybrid Duvet (double size) is down to £169.15.

articles.title: Young female entrepreneur appeals for support
articles.summary: Amiwan Service Centre, led by Amina Haruna, seeks support to expand the production and sale of its cosmetics, body creams, detergents, and shampoos. The expansion aims to increase production and engage more young people in the production and sale of its products, while also increasing the sourcing of raw materials like shea butter.

articles.title: New Lidl supermarket headed to Route 17 in Paramus. Here's what to know
articles.author: Stephanie Noda
articles.summary: Lidl is opening a new grocery store location in Paramus on February 12, with a ribbon-cutting ceremony at 7:40 a.m. The store will offer specialty sauces, cured meats, fresh pastries, produce, and private label products.

articles.title: Take a peek at 4 cool variants of the Redmi Note 14 Series, check the specifications and excellence of the camera
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the Redmi Note 14 series, featuring models with up to a 200MP main camera and AI-enhanced photography. The series emphasizes advanced camera technology, including AI scene detection, AI remosaic technology, and optical image stabilization. The new phones also include improved selfie features, like a wide-angle lens for group shots, and offer enhanced low-light performance.

articles.title: Alibaba touts ‘superior' new AI model
articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.summary: Alibaba Cloud has launched its upgraded AI model, Qwen 2.5 Max, which the company claims outperforms DeepSeek V3 and Meta's Llama model. Alibaba Cloud also asserts that its AI surpasses models from OpenAI and Anthropic in certain benchmarks. This release is part of Alibaba's strategy to attract AI developers to its cloud services.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Experience invites are being sent out to fans – check your spam ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Nintendo revealed the next-generation Nintendo Switch 2 console. The company announced a series of hands-on events for fans globally to experience the new console.

articles.title: OmniBSIC Bank ushers in strategic evolution with new tagline
articles.author: GTonline
articles.summary: OmniBSIC Bank Ghana Limited has launched a new tagline, "…Not Just Another Bank," to emphasize its commitment to extraordinary customer experience and innovative banking services. The bank aims to redefine the banking experience through technological innovation and personalized solutions, positioning itself as the bank of choice in Ghana.

articles.title: Gadget review: Samsung builds on AI success with new S25
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 smartphone. It builds upon the S24 series, enhancing existing features.

articles.title: L&T Technology Services Secures $80 Million Digital Engineering Transformation Deal in Sustainability Segment
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services (LTTS) has secured an $80 million deal to drive digital transformation for a US-based manufacturer. LTTS will establish a Center of Excellence in India to enable digital transformation and product lifecycle management. This aims to bring high-quality products to market faster through AI-powered insights and digitally connected solutions.

articles.title: How to celebrate Lunar New Year using Google AI
articles.author: Jan Milo Severo
articles.summary: Google promotes the use of its products and services for Lunar New Year celebrations. Circle to Search can be used to find the best parties, Lens in Maps helps navigate crowds, Google Play offers Lunar New Year promos on mobile games like Honkai: Star Rail and Monster Hunter Now, and Bard can generate recipes and create custom festive cards.

articles.title: This new TV tech could elevate your PS6 gameplay
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Consumers are encouraged to purchase new TVs in anticipation of the upcoming PlayStation 6 (PS6) release.

articles.title: CVS Tests New App-Enabled Unlocking Feature in Select Locations Hit Hard by Shoplifting
articles.author: Golden Gate Media
articles.summary: CVS is testing a new unlocking feature within its mobile app, allowing customers to open secured shelves without employee assistance. This service is currently available at three CVS locations and requires customers to join the ExtraCare program, connect to store Wi-Fi, and enable Bluetooth. Expansion to 10-15 stores is planned if the pilot is successful.

articles.title: The insanely popular Ninja CREAMi is on sale at Walmart but not for long
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Ninja is introducing the CREAMi Ice Cream Maker, which transforms frozen solid bases into ice cream, sorbets, and milkshakes. With Creamify Technology, the CREAMi transforms frozen blocks into creamy textures in minutes, offering customizable treats and one-touch programs for various frozen desserts.

articles.title: Ludicrous Feed: A closer look at the new Tesla Model Y
articles.author: Ludicrous Feed
articles.summary: Tesla's Model Y, recently seen in Singapore, features exterior design changes. The Model Y also includes new lighting elements and interior enhancements.

articles.title: How To Buy One Of The New Mid-Size Toyota Trucks In Five Easy Steps
articles.author: Wes Siler
articles.summary: The article compares the new Toyota 4Runner, Tacoma, and Land Cruiser models, which are all based on Toyota's TNGA-F frame. It highlights key differences in pricing, options, and payload capabilities, advising potential buyers to assess their payload needs before choosing a model. The analysis also covers traction features like four-wheel drive and locking rear differentials, and suggests aftermarket modifications for enhanced performance.

articles.title: Bookshop.org Looks to Revolutionize the Book Industry (Again) With a New Ebook Platform
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Bookshop.org launched a new ebook platform. The new platform introduces a new service by the company.

articles.title: The OnePlus 13 is already set an impossible standard for Android phones in 2025
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 13, a smartphone setting a new standard with its performance, battery life, and software. The OnePlus 13 features a silicon carbon battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and up to 24GB of RAM. Priced at $1,000, it challenges competitors like the Samsung Galaxy S25 series and offers excellent value.

articles.title: Unmissable Sky Mobile deal gets you latest Samsung S25 plus FREE Galaxy Buds worth £219
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 series. Sky Mobile offers a free pair of Galaxy Buds3 Pro with S25 pre-orders.

articles.title: New Product Introduction Quality Assurance Engineer
articles.author: The Engineer
articles.summary: A company is hiring a New Product Introduction (NPI) Quality Assurance Engineer to support its Manufacturing team in the UK. The engineer will provide quality support across all NPI programs.

articles.title: Debenhams shoppers can get discount on 'best perfume ever' with 'unforgettable' scent
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Debenhams is offering customers a substantial discount on a luxury fragrance. This sale represents a promotional activity related to the fragrance product.

articles.title: GOG revamps its 'Dreamlist' feature to better pry old games out of publishers
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: GOG has revamped its community wishlist, now called 'Dreamlist'. This updated service allows users to request games for the DRM-free storefront and receive notifications when desired titles become available.

articles.title: DLF introduces new Johnson Sports Seed mixtures
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: DLF introduced new mixtures.

articles.title: Marc Jacobs launches three new daisy perfumes – and the scents have surprised me
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: New fragrances are introduced, featuring a fresh and fruity scent. These fragrances are available for a limited time.

articles.title: NordVPN launches new 'revolutionary' censorship-resistant VPN protocol
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: NordWhisper is engineered to counter sophisticated network filtering methods. The service aims to provide solutions against challenging network filtering techniques.

articles.title: Score the New Samsung S25 for Free on a T-Mobile Go5G Next Plan
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: T-Mobile is offering the new Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus for free to customers who trade in an eligible device in any condition and switch to the Go5G Next plan. The offer promotes adoption of both the new phone and T-Mobile's Go5G Next plan.

articles.title: Horago launches revolutionary digital room service solution
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Hospitality technology company launched its innovative Digital Room Service product. The solution allows hotel guests to scan a QR code to access a designed menu.

articles.title: Debenhams shoppers race to buy heavily reduced Dyson as Blue Cross sale launches online
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Debenhams is offering a 70 discount on the Dyson Supersonic Hairdryer as part of its Blue Cross Sale.

articles.title: Alibaba releases AI model it claims surpasses DeepSeek-V3
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Alibaba has released a new version of its AI model, Tongyi Qianwen. This update signifies a new product introduction or service enhancement within Alibaba's AI offerings.

articles.title: AI agent ai16z rebrands to ElizaOS to enhance collaborations with web2 and web3 entities
articles.author: Invezz
articles.summary: The AI agent open-source network Ai16z is rebranding to ElizaOS due to its significant growth. Founder Shaw Walters confirmed the change is aimed to provide a more distinct brand identity. The rebrand represents a significant update and relaunch of the project.

articles.title: A&K Clover Works Revolutionizes Branding and Creative Services with Heartfelt Innovation
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Austin Mayo and Katie Rose offer branding services to help clients scale their products and services. They utilize tailor-made branding strategies.

articles.title: Newest Whataburger now open on Ronald Reagan
articles.author: Liberty Hill Independent Staff
articles.summary: Whataburger has opened a new restaurant location in Williamson County featuring digital menu boards, a spacious dining room, and a state-of-the-art kitchen.

articles.title: Samsung sets stage for future of AI-powered experiences
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Galaxy S25 series, featuring significant hardware upgrades and AI-driven innovation with Galaxy AI and One UI 7. The Galaxy S25 series introduces features like AI Select, enhanced Circle to Search, and improved gaming capabilities with the Snapdragon® 8 Elite processor. Additionally, the Galaxy S25 will be the first Galaxy smartphone to include recycled cobalt sourced from the batteries of previously used Galaxy devices.

articles.title: Damro Group unveils first ever AI Zone in partnership with Samsung
articles.summary: Damro, in partnership with Samsung, has launched the first AI-powered smart zone in Sri Lanka, located at Marino Mall, Colombo 3. The Samsung AI Zone showcases a range of AI-powered products including Samsung Smart TVs, Refrigerators, Washing Machines, and Galaxy Smartphones, offering an immersive experience of smart living technologies.

articles.title: Elver Buds X Review
articles.author: Farhaan Tipu
articles.summary: The Elver Buds X are under review, focusing on sound quality, battery life, and features. The review aims to determine if the product is worth purchasing.
